name: Survive the Nights
description: This is an unlisted pre-alpha version of STN and is a WORK IN PROGRESS. Please only consider purchasing the game if you're interested in testing builds and fleshing out features. Many features are missing, many features need balancing!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: 2ghz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or higher/AMD Radeon HD 7870 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: 3ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
